hackathons.name: Winter CodeFest
hackathons.short_description: Embrace the winter vibes and code your way to victory in this festive 48-hour coding challenge!

hackathons.name: Holiday Hackathon Extravaganza
hackathons.short_description: Celebrate the holidays with a hackathon like no other. Spread joy through innovative coding projects!

hackathons.name: TechFrost Challenge
hackathons.short_description: Step into the winter wonderland of technology. Solve challenges and warm up with exciting prizes!

hackathons.name: CyberSec Blizzard Battle
hackathons.short_description: Face the cybersecurity storm head-on. Defend against virtual blizzards and emerge as the cyber champion!

hackathons.name: Blockchain Frosty Fusion
hackathons.short_description: Explore the chilly realms of blockchain. Build cool decentralized applications and shape the future of tech!

hackathons.name: AI Snowflake Hackfest
hackathons.short_description: Let the AI snowflakes guide your creativity. Develop intelligent solutions and win the grand snowfest prize!
